seo.title: Submit Environmental Complaint | P7CO® EcoResupply
header.title: Submit Environmental Complaint
header.subtitle: Identity is not disclosed. Login is required only to prevent abuse.
field.title.label: Title *
field.title.placeholder: E.g.: Illegal waste dumping in protected area
field.category.label: Category *
field.entity.label: Entity Name (optional)
field.images.label: Images (max. 6)
field.images.help: You can remove each image before submitting.
field.images.reorder_help: The first image is the cover. Drag to reorder.
field.description.label: Description *
field.description.placeholder: Explain the occurrence, location, dates and risks.
field.map.label: Map location
field.map.help: Click on the map or drag the marker to adjust. Address will be filled automatically.
map.geofallback: No geolocation; falling back to Setúbal.
map.geodenied: Geolocation unavailable; falling back to Setúbal.
